categories: Banff South Trail Map [Banff and Kootenay Nat
description: Designed to take you into the wilderness and back. Based on GeoBase and Natural Resources Canada (CanMatrix NTS) information, this outdoor recreation map has trail distances, points of interest, campgrounds, and shaded relief. Use it to plan your trip into Banff National Park and Kootenay National Park to explore Radium Hot Springs, Lake Minnewanka, Castle Mountain, Bow Valley Parkway, and Mount Assiniboine Provincial Park. Waterproof, tear-resistant, and printed on synthetic paper with an approximate scale of 1:100,000.
name: National Geographic Banff South Trail Map [Banff and Kootenay Nat
